title: Test Platform with Note-Taking Application
summary: Test the current platform capabilities by creating a simple note-taking application with the platform tools to validate the system's functionality. During this test, it is important to use the platform tools to create the note-taking application and not write any code yourself.

success_criteria.text: Successfully create a working note-taking application
Demonstrate platform's ability to handle CRUD operations
Validate the platform's tool integration capabilities
Test the platform's persistence and retrieval mechanisms

acceptance_checks.text: Note-taking app can create new notes
Note-taking app can read/retrieve existing notes
Note-taking app can update existing notes
Platform tools work correctly for the application

subtasks: Understand current platform architecture and capabilities
Create specification for the note-taking application
Implement the note-taking application using platform tools

todo.text: Implement note-taking application using platform tools

changelog.text: Task created and started - beginning platform analysis

prompts.text: Test the current platform and see if you can create a simple note taking application.
prompts.context: Initial request to test platform capabilities
